# bds-navbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                             | Type                                                                                                         | Default           |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------- |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color` | Width, number to define navbar width.                                                   | `"surface-1" \| "surface-2" \| "surface-3"`                                                                  | `'surface-1'`     |
| `justifyContent`  | `justify-content`  | Justify Content. Used to align itens in navbar.                                         | `"center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"` | `'space-between'` |
| `orientation`     | `orientation`      | Navbar orientation. Used to orientation the navbar. Either on the left or on the right. | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                                                                                 | `'vertical'`      |
